refiCap.name: ReFi Cap
refiCap.description: Sustainable cap made from recycled materials supporting regenerative finance. Features eco-friendly construction and ReFi-themed design. Perfect for climate-conscious crypto enthusiasts.

refiTShirt.name: ReFi T-Shirt
refiTShirt.description: Organic cotton t-shirt celebrating regenerative finance. Made from sustainable materials with environmental consciousness in mind. Features ReFi graphics and comfortable fit for everyday wear.

refiHoodie.name: ReFi Hoodie
refiHoodie.description: Sustainable hoodie supporting regenerative finance movement. Made from organic cotton with recycled elements. Features ReFi branding and comfortable fit for climate-conscious individuals.

defiCap.name: DeFi Cap
defiCap.description: Premium cap celebrating decentralized finance. Features DeFi-inspired design elements and high-quality materials. Perfect for DeFi enthusiasts and protocol contributors.

defiTShirt.name: DeFi T-Shirt
defiTShirt.description: Technical t-shirt for DeFi enthusiasts and protocol users. Features DeFi-themed graphics and comfortable cotton blend. Perfect for DeFi conferences, meetups, or casual DeFi lifestyle.

defiHoodie.name: DeFi Hoodie
defiHoodie.description: Premium hoodie celebrating the DeFi revolution. Features DeFi-inspired design, comfortable fleece blend, and practical pockets. Ideal for DeFi developers and protocol contributors.

governanceCap.name: Governance Cap
governanceCap.description: Professional cap for governance participants and DAO members. Features clean design and high-quality materials. Perfect for governance meetings and DAO events.

governanceTShirt.name: Governance T-Shirt
governanceTShirt.description: Clean t-shirt celebrating decentralized governance. Features governance-themed elements and comfortable fit. Perfect for DAO members and governance participants.

governanceHoodie.name: Governance Hoodie
governanceHoodie.description: Comfortable hoodie for governance enthusiasts and DAO contributors. Features governance-inspired design and premium materials. Perfect for long governance sessions and DAO events.

codingCap.name: Coding Cap
codingCap.description: Developer-focused cap with coding-inspired design elements. Features breathable materials and comfortable fit. Perfect for coding sessions, hackathons, or developer meetups.

codingTShirt.name: Coding T-Shirt
codingTShirt.description: Technical t-shirt for developers and coding enthusiasts. Features code-inspired graphics and comfortable cotton blend. Perfect for coding marathons, hackathons, or tech conferences.

codingHoodie.name: Coding Hoodie
codingHoodie.description: Ultimate comfort hoodie for developers and coding enthusiasts. Features code-themed design, thumbhole cuffs, and premium fleece. Perfect for long coding sessions and developer meetups.

degenCap.name: Degen Cap
degenCap.description: Bold cap for true crypto degenerates. Features edgy design elements and high-quality construction. Perfect for high-risk traders and meme coin enthusiasts.

degenTShirt.name: Degen T-Shirt
degenTShirt.description: Edgy t-shirt celebrating the wild side of crypto culture. Features bold graphics and comfortable fit. Perfect for degen traders and meme coin enthusiasts.

degenHoodie.name: Degen Hoodie
degenHoodie.description: Bold hoodie for crypto degenerates and high-risk traders. Features edgy design, comfortable fleece, and practical pockets. Perfect for degen trading sessions and meme coin events.

collections.subtitle: Discover curated collections of Web3 merchandise from top creators

refiCollection.name: ReFi
refiCollection.description: Celebrate Regenerative Finance with sustainable fashion that makes a positive impact. This collection focuses on environmental consciousness and social responsibility in the crypto space. Each piece represents the commitment to building a better future through regenerative practices, carbon credits, and sustainable blockchain solutions.
refiCollection.shortDescription: Sustainable fashion for a regenerative future

defiCollection.name: DeFi
defiCollection.description: Embrace the decentralized finance revolution with cutting-edge designs inspired by liquidity pools, yield farming, and decentralized exchanges. This collection celebrates financial freedom and innovation in the crypto space. Perfect for DeFi enthusiasts who want to showcase their knowledge of protocols, AMMs, and yield strategies.

governanceCollection.name: Governance
governanceCollection.description: Clothing that celebrates decentralized governance and community decision-making. This collection emphasizes transparency, collaboration, and collective intelligence in blockchain projects. Each piece reflects the democratic values of DAOs, governance tokens, and community-driven protocols. Perfect for governance participants and protocol contributors.

codingCollection.name: Coding
codingCollection.description: For developers, builders, and technical innovators in the Web3 space. This collection celebrates the art of coding with designs inspired by smart contracts, programming languages, and blockchain development. From Solidity to Rust, from debugging to deploying, this collection honors the builders who make Web3 possible.
codingCollection.shortDescription: Code your way into Web3 fashion

degenCollection.name: Degen
degenCollection.description: The ultimate collection for true crypto degenerates. Bold, edgy designs that capture the wild spirit of meme coins, high-risk trading, and the chaotic energy of crypto culture. This collection is for those who live on the edge, embrace volatility, and aren't afraid to go all-in on the next big thing in Web3.

about.title: About Copoaz√∫ Labs

about.underDevelopment: Our about page is under development. Learn more about Copoaz√∫ Labs and our mission soon!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between traditional fashion and the decentralized future, creating exclusive merchandise that empowers the Web3 community. We believe in democratizing fashion through blockchain technology while maintaining the highest standards of sustainability and quality.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Pushing boundaries with cutting-edge blockchain technology and sustainable fashion practices that set new industry standards.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a global network of Web3 enthusiasts who share our vision of decentralized, inclusive fashion.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to eco-friendly and ethical practices throughout our entire supply chain, from design to delivery.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Open and honest in all our operations, providing full visibility into our processes and impact.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The visionaries behind the Web3 fashion revolution
